books.title: The Mythical Man-Month
books.author: Frederick P. Brooks Jr.
books.notes: Why adding more people to a late project makes it later. Essential for anyone leading engineering teams.

books.title: The Design of Everyday Things
books.author: Don Norman
books.notes: A foundational text on human-centered design. Changed how I think about usability.

books.title: Thinking in Systems
books.author: Donella H. Meadows
books.notes: A primer on systems thinking. Helps you see the interconnections and feedback loops everywhere.

books.title: An Elegant Puzzle
books.author: Will Larson
books.notes: Systems of engineering management. Practical frameworks for growing teams.

books.title: The Pragmatic Programmer
books.author: David Thomas & Andrew Hunt
books.notes: The classic guide to becoming a better developer. Timeless advice on craft.

books.title: The Courage to Be Disliked
books.author: Ichiro Kishimi & Fumitake Koga
books.notes: Adlerian psychology through Socratic dialogue. Liberating perspective on freedom and happiness.

books.title: How Emotions Are Made
books.author: Lisa Feldman Barrett
books.notes: The secret life of the brain. Emotions aren't hardwiredâ€”they're constructed.

books.title: The Anthropocene Reviewed
books.author: John Green
books.notes: Essays reviewing facets of the human-centered planet on a five-star scale. Beautiful and moving.

books.title: Make Something Wonderful
books.author: Steve Jobs
books.notes: Steve Jobs in his own words. Curated speeches, interviews, and correspondence.

books.title: Bird by Bird
books.author: Anne Lamott
books.notes: Instructions on writing and life. Honest, funny, and deeply human.

books.title: Man's Search for Meaning
books.author: Viktor E. Frankl
books.notes: Finding purpose in suffering. A profound meditation on meaning and resilience.

books.title: The Molecule of More
books.author: Daniel Z. Lieberman & Michael E. Long
books.notes: How dopamine shapes love, ambition, and addiction. Fascinating neuroscience.

books.title: Steve Jobs
books.author: Walter Isaacson
books.notes: The authorized biography. Complex portrait of a visionary and difficult genius.

books.title: The Creative Act
books.author: Rick Rubin
books.notes: A way of being. Meditations on creativity from the legendary producer.

books.title: How to Know a Person
books.author: David Brooks
books.notes: The art of seeing others deeply. A guide to genuine human connection.

books.title: The Great Mental Models
books.author: Shane Parrish
books.notes: General thinking concepts. Frameworks for better decision making.

books.title: A Life in Parts
books.author: Bryan Cranston
books.notes: A memoir told through roles. Surprisingly profound on craft and persistence.

books.title: Tomorrow, and Tomorrow, and Tomorrow
books.author: Gabrielle Zevin
books.notes: A novel about video games, creativity, love, and loss. Beautifully captures friendship and collaboration.
